content: free crochet cricket pattern v_stitch infinity scarf materials you can follow this pattern with any weight of yarn and appropriate size crochet hook for the results in the photos you will need the following items 1 skein red heart boutique unforgettable 5mm hook 1 darning needle instructions the beginning chain for this pattern is always a multiple of 3 + 3 for 7 v stitches across as photographed chain 24 for 8 v stitches across - chain 27 and so on double_crochet in 4th chain from the hook chain 1 double_crochet in next chain skip one chain double_crochet in next chain ch1 double_crochet in next chain *6 more times to last chain* double_crochet in last chain ch3 turn double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in each of the 7 v-stitches across the spaces with the chain 1 spaces from the foundation row last stitch - double_crochet in the top chain of the chain 3 from pervious row ch3 turn *repeat until scarf is desired length* leave a tail of 12-15 inches and use this to whip stitch the two ends of the scarf together leave the ending tail on the opposite side as the beginning tail after you whip stitch the scarf ends together you can tie a firm knot with the two tails then sew them in or continue and whip stitch back across a second time for a more secure seam you can see in this photo that you have 1 double_crochet beginning each row followed by 7 v stitches and finally another ending double_crochet be sure not to use a crochet hook that is too small for your yarn or your scarf will be stiffer than you want the color changes in the red heart boutique unforgettable series really work well with this pattern but you can use any yarn you can also begin with several row of half_double_crochet and end with half_double_crochet as well rather than sewing the ends together for the infinity scarf please share your creations on our facebook page or website www crochetcricket com
